title: Harley or Harry?
body:
okay so i know that this is probably not true but hear me out. Harley from Iron Man 3 is Harry Osborn.

There are a lot of things that would probably get in the way of this but basically my theory is that Harley Keener’s real name is Harley/ Harry Osborn, his father left him 6 years ago because he couldn’t deal with the fact that his first wife died from giving birth to Harley and couldn’t look at Harley’s face without seeing her’s. Harley took on his stepmoms last name, though he doesn’t know that she’s not his real mom.  Like he said in Iron Man 3, his father left 6 years ago, so if he was about 10 or 11 in that movie he would have been 4 or 5 when this happened. It would have been fairly easy to forget about his real mother if his dad never talked about her and his stepmother acted as if he was her own son after his dad left.

My theory for the next Avengers movie regarding Harley is that when Tony sees him again Harley will bring up his dad, Norman Osborn, and how they reconnected again. Norman told him about his real mother and is bringing him to New York to live with him.

From there it’s pretty straightforward, Harley and Peter become friends blah blah blah, but i don’t think that would happen until the 3rd spider-man or at least an end credit for Far From Home hinting at the next movie.

don’t @ me tho it’s just a stupid theory

title: Hugging Peter: The Secret Good-Bye
body:
Here`s a horrific, heart-wrenching theory for you. Remember the flashback in Spiderman: Homecoming about what happened in Berlin and shortly afterwards? Tony accompanied Peter back to his apartment in Queens. During the ride, Tony is seemingly comfortable and joking, going so far as to make a sexual innuendo towards May. Then, the not-hug happens.

Now, I have always had issues with this scene: Tony is far too calm and relaxed for somebody who just had his friend diagnosed with permanent paralysis. Possibly, the scene is set after Siberia, instead, which would mean Tony joined them on the plane after the suit was damaged in the fight. However, that gives the car scene an even worse pacing issue: Tony is not fazed by the fall-out with Steve, the truth about his parents’ death or the break-up of the Avengers.

In any case, Tony’s mood is much too elevated, much too excited and focused on Peter. 


Here’s my theory: What if this is not OriginalTimeline!Tony but rather Avengers4!Tony in disguise?

He went back to meet Peter for the very last time. And that is why he initiates the hug. As a final good-bye. It is self-indulgent act before he intends to sacrifice himself. He offers Peter his presence, his attention, and a last video message.

In the video message to “May”, Tony even praises Peter, offering the same encouragement as his father did in the film reel in Iron Man 2. It also explains Tony’s absence in Homecoming. He was simply not aware that he had made a deeper connection with Peter that would warrant the level of communication Peter initiates. To him, Peter had only ever asked to care for the little guys. Then they met in the airport, that’s it. He does not remember Peter asking for the “next mission”, because he was not in the car. Happy was always supposed to take Peter home, anyway, even before Tony joined them on short notice.


I can never watch the scene again without imagining that this is Tony’s desperate attempt at normalcy, at a secret good-bye. And when Peter is about to leave the car, he reaches out for him. One last time.

summary: You can tell tony antis don’t have brains when they call tony ‘tonky’ when donkeys are AMAZING animals, here are some facts I...
body:
You can tell tony antis don’t have brains when they call tony ‘tonky’ when donkeys are AMAZING animals, here are some facts I found today:

-People who know donkeys report that they are smart, personable, and affectionate. They understand dozens of voice commands, come running when they are called, and are fiercely loyal to those they trust.

-They are playful, gentle animals who form faithful bonds and express an eagerness to learn.

-They are exceptionally intelligent and have a phenomenal memory (can recall complex routes and recognize animals they haven’t seen for years).

-They have a logical, flexible approach to problem-solving.

-Donkeys enjoy company and develop strong emotional bonds with other animals.

-In many countries of the world, and in many situations, they are used as the preferred mode of transport.

-They have been helping humankind for thousands of years.

-They are called ‘beasts of burden’ because they are used to help people transport food and water among other things.

-A donkey is stronger than a horse of the same size.

-Donkeys are more independent in their thinking than horses and will reason, then make decisions based on their safety.

-Training a donkey relies upon showing him or her, by words and action, that they can trust you to protect them from harm. They learn what it is we want them to do if we take time to show them.

IT’S NOT EVEN AN INSULT PEOPLE IT’S A GODDAM COMPLIMENT AND BTW THEY ARE CUTE AF

title: successful - Peter Parker
body:
part five - Sweetener Series

Song: successful - Ariana Grande

Prompt: “Happy Birthday!”

“What did you get me?”

“It’s a surprise.”

Summary: you celebrate Peter’s birthday.

Warnings: fluff, little smutty

The rest of the school year went by pretty slowly. So when summer started the first thing you did was take a road trip and go to the beach! That’s all you ever wanted to do, especially now that your dating Peter. Building sandcastles was at the top of your list of things to do together. Burying him in the sand was number two.

“What do you want to do first?” Peter asked joyously when we got out of the car.

“Oh you know we have to build sandcastles first!” you rushed over to him hugging his side.

Walking down to the beach bantering about how relaxing and fun the day was going to be. You pushed off of Peter once you reached the sand and started running around freely, the biggest smile on your face.

“Wait for me!” Peter ran after you.

“NO! I’m as free as a bird!” You held your arms out against the wind.

“Let me join you then,” Peter quickly came up next to you being a bird.

“Look at our lovebirds,” MJ sarcastically says while taking video of our birdisms.

“Um, definitely birdlike,” Ned agreed.

Running up to the water you drop to your knees and enjoy the cool waves against your skin. Peter came down behind you wrapping his arms around you, keeping the harsh sea winds from making you shiver.

All of a sudden you hear a quiet beeping noise.

“What’s that noise?” You looked around for the source.

“I don’t hear anything,” Peter flustered getting up off the sand.

“Are you sure? You sound like you know what the sound is,” your eyebrow raised at him not believing one word of that sentence.

“Uh……,” looking down and pulling his phone out, “oh I’m just getting a call,” he rubbed the back of his head with a nervous smile on his face.

“Well don’t answer it,” lying on the beach looking at the sky.

“Why not?” He quizzed.

“Because were having a good time,” you sighed, “obviously,” you mumbled.

Peter held his phone looking at you thinking about what to do. Ultimately he answered the phone. Knowing who was on the other end.

“Hello,” Peter said quietly walking away from you.

“Kid! We need your help!” Tony Stark scrambled on the other line.

“What’s happening Mr. Stark?” Peter sounded worried.

“This joker got it into his head that it’s okay to steal my stuff,” Tony exasperated, “I could really use you right now kid.”

“Alright, I’ll be there as soon as possible!” Peter hung up.

Walking over to where you laid Peter did the same, mounting on his elbow. Looking at your relaxed facade he hated the news he was about to break.

“(Y/N), I hav-,” Peter started.

“Stop right there Parker,” you lifted your hand in front of his face, “I know who was on the phone. The only reason you would have answered is if it was like super duper important. So just go, do whatever needs to be done,” you looked him in the eyes, “Hero.”

“Oh so you think I’m a hero?” He questioned rolling on top of you. Keeping himself from crushing you by putting his hands on either side of you head.

“To me you are,” you said sweetly looking into his eyes.

“You are the only person I wanna be a hero too,” he bent his elbows enough to bring his lips to yours in passion. Wrapping arms around his neck bringing him all the way down to you. You took charge and rolled on top of him, like a classic beach movie make out. But that’s where it ended, he abruptly stopped the perfect summer day to rush towards the Stark internship.

Weeks had past since the beginning of summer beach day. Now it was almost the end, and you were planning what to do for Peter’s birthday. So much happened over the summer that now it’s coming to a nice slow end with a baller birthday bash.

“Oh it’s going to be so much fun,” you said over the phone to Ned your co-birthday planner in crime.

“We have to keep it a surprise though, so no spilling the beans. I know how you tell him everything,” he said seriously.

“I don’t tell him everything,” you scoffed.

“Yes you do,” you could feel him roll his eyes through the phone.

“If you say so. But I can keep a secret,” you tell him.

“What secret?” Peter came from behind kissing your neck in surprise.

“Ned thinks I can’t keep a secret,” you tell him as you put the speaker phone on.

“That’s because you can’t,” he laughs.

“Wanna bet?” I raise my eyebrow wondering if he would take the bait.

“I’ll take that bet!” Ned exclaimed.

“Oh yeah I’ll put money on it,” Peter said.

“Hey!” You narrowed your eyes turning to look at him.

“What?” he said almost offended.

“You don’t believe I can keep a secret?!” You whine.

“Okay, I’m gonna get off the phone now. Peter if you wanna continue this conversation, just text me,” Ned hung up.

“I know you can keep a secret,” he took your hands in his pulling you close to him.

“Then why did you take the bet?” You sighed.

“I was putting money on Ned losing,” he laughed.

“Oh Peter,” you took him into a hug with your head on his chest, “what would I do without you?”

“I don’t know, probably be miserably and secretly in love with me forever,” he laughed harder.

Looking up at him with eyes narrow just shaking your head vigorously, “that’s not funny.”

“It’s a little funny,” he smirked at you.

“No it’s not!” You pout.

“Your right,” he looked at you seriously, “it’s not funny.”

“Damn straight,” you crossed your arms.

“You are so adorable,” he just looked at you admiring your soft features. Reaching out to touch your lips. You stopped him.

“Happy Birthday!” you giggle.

“What?” Peter took a step back surprised at your sudden outburst.

“Well it is your birthday today isn’t it?” You roll your eyes.

“Yeah…..” he paused, “so, what did you get me?” Peter started pestering you with a smirk and eyebrow wiggles.

“It’s a surprise,” you sing.

“Aw come on……..,” he whined, “tell me!”

“No,” you giggled hitting his chest.

Taking you in his arms, Peter kisses you passionately. Leaving your lips swollen and speechless when he pulls away.

Hicuping you ask him, “what was that for?”

“No reason, I just think your cute,” he winked.

“I think your cute too,” you wrapped your arms around his neck kissing him again. Softly, longingly making the moment last for as long as possible. Peter picked you up walking you over to the couch. Laying you down gently he caressed your cheek looking into your eyes with love.

Tugging at his hair pulling him closer to you, lips touching slightly. You hug his body with your legs bringing him down to you. Kissing and biting your neck leaving his mark on you. Peter abruptly stopped the pleasure filled moment and lifted off your body to take his shirt off. Coming back down placing a hand on your breast, smashing his lips onto yours in passion. Playing with your hair………

The front door shut. Footsteps were coming closer to the living area. But you were much to enthralled in your activities to hear or notice anything.

“WHAT THE FUCK!” Aunt May took you out of bliss.

Separating as quickly as possible red spread across all cheeks in embarrassment.

“No need to get angry May,” a smooth voice came from behind you, “they are just kids, time to make mistakes. As long as they were planing on using protection.”

Your blush only grew.

“Uh…,” Peter groaned.

“What Peter?” May put her hand on her hip, “you don’t think having sex on a couch is a mistake!”

“We were just making out!” Peter threw his hand up in defense and his head back in annoyance.

“That was going to turn into sex,” the voice said, “was it going to be your birthday present?”

You could here the smirk.

“No Mr.Stark,” Peter was annoyed now, “it wasn’t going to be my present.”

Your eyes got wide. The voice was Tony Stark.

“Well kid, here’s a present from me if your girlfriend hasn’t gotten you anything.” And he left.

“So nothing happened?” Aunt May pestered.

“Nothing happened,” Peter looked at her with sincerity.

Before May could speak the door flew open with Ned, MJ and a bunch of your other friends for a surprise party. Leaving Peter speechless. The night was a rager. You did things that parents wouldn’t want there kids to do, but no one cared. It was a birthday!

————————————————————————-

a/n: I almost reached the text limit with this part. This has been part six of Sweetener Series! Part seven coming in the next few days<3

You took charge and rolled on top of him, like a classic beach movie make out. But that’s where it ended, he abruptly stopped the perfect summer day to rush towards the Stark internship.

Weeks had past since the beginning of summer beach day. Now it was almost the end, and you were planning what to do for Peter’s birthday. So much happened over the summer that now it’s coming to a nice slow end with a baller birthday bash.

“Oh it’s going to be so much fun,” you said over the phone to Ned your co-birthday planner in crime.

“We have to keep it a surprise though, so no spilling the beans. I know how you tell him everything,” he said seriously.

“I don’t tell him everything,” you scoffed.

“Yes you do,” you could feel him roll his eyes through the phone.

“If you say so. But I can keep a secret,” you tell him.

“What secret?” Peter came from behind kissing your neck in surprise.

“Ned thinks I can’t keep a secret,” you tell him as you put the speaker phone on.

“That’s because you can’t,” he laughs.

“Wanna bet?” I raise my eyebrow wondering if he would take the bait.

“I’ll take that bet!” Ned exclaimed.

“Oh yeah I’ll put money on it,” Peter said.

“Hey!” You narrowed your eyes turning to look at him.

“What?” he said almost offended.

“You don’t believe I can keep a secret?!” You whine.

“Okay, I’m gonna get off the phone now. Peter if you wanna continue this conversation, just text me,” Ned hung up.

“I know you can keep a secret,” he took your hands in his pulling you close to him.

“Then why did you take the bet?” You sighed.

“I was putting money on Ned losing,” he laughed.

“Oh Peter,” you took him into a hug with your head on his chest, “what would I do without you?”

“I don’t know, probably be miserably and secretly in love with me forever,” he laughed harder.

Looking up at him with eyes narrow just shaking your head vigorously, “that’s not funny.”

“It’s a little funny,” he smirked at you.

“No it’s not!” You pout.

“Your right,” he looked at you seriously, “it’s not funny.”

“Damn straight,” you crossed your arms.

“You are so adorable,” he just looked at you admiring your soft features. Reaching out to touch your lips. You stopped him.

“Happy Birthday!” you giggle.

“What?” Peter took a step back surprised at your sudden outburst.

“Well it is your birthday today isn’t it?” You roll your eyes.

“Yeah…..” he paused, “so, what did you get me?” Peter started pestering you with a smirk and eyebrow wiggles.

“It’s a surprise,” you sing.

“Aw come on……..,” he whined, “tell me!”

“No,” you giggled hitting his chest.

Taking you in his arms, Peter kisses you passionately. Leaving your lips swollen and speechless when he pulls away.

Hicuping you ask him, “what was that for?”

“No reason, I just think your cute,” he winked.

“I think your cute too,” you wrapped your arms around his neck kissing him again. Softly, longingly making the moment last for as long as possible. Peter picked you up walking you over to the couch. Laying you down gently he caressed your cheek looking into your eyes with love.

Tugging at his hair pulling him closer to you, lips touching slightly. You hug his body with your legs bringing him down to you. Kissing and biting your neck leaving his mark on you. Peter abruptly stopped the pleasure filled moment and lifted off your body to take his shirt off. Coming back down placing a hand on your breast, smashing his lips onto yours in passion. Playing with your hair………

The front door shut. Footsteps were coming closer to the living area. But you were much to enthralled in your activities to hear or notice anything.

“WHAT THE FUCK!” Aunt May took you out of bliss.

Separating as quickly as possible red spread across all cheeks in embarrassment.

“No need to get angry May,” a smooth voice came from behind you, “they are just kids, time to make mistakes. As long as they were planing on using protection.”

Your blush only grew.

“Uh…,” Peter groaned.

“What Peter?” May put her hand on her hip, “you don’t think having sex on a couch is a mistake!”

“We were just making out!” Peter threw his hand up in defense and his head back in annoyance.

“That was going to turn into sex,” the voice said, “was it going to be your birthday present?”

You could here the smirk.

“No Mr.Stark,” Peter was annoyed now, “it wasn’t going to be my present.”

Your eyes got wide. The voice was Tony Stark.

“Well kid, here’s a present from me if your girlfriend hasn’t gotten you anything.” And he left.

“So nothing happened?” Aunt May pestered.

“Nothing happened,” Peter looked at her with sincerity.

Before May could speak the door flew open with Ned, MJ and a bunch of your other friends for a surprise party. Leaving Peter speechless. The night was a rager. You did things that parents wouldn’t want there kids to do, but no one cared. It was a birthday!

————————————————————————-

a/n: I almost reached the text limit with this part. This has been part six of Sweetener Series! Part seven coming in the next few days<3
trail.content_abstract:
part five - Sweetener Series

Song: successful - Ariana Grande

Prompt: “Happy Birthday!”

“What did you get me?”

“It’s a surprise.”

Summary: you celebrate Peter’s birthday.

Warnings: fluff, little smutty

The rest of the school year went by pretty slowly. So when summer started the first thing you did was take a road trip and go to the beach! That’s all you ever wanted to do, especially now that your dating Peter. Building sandcastles was at the top of your list of things to do together. Burying him in the sand was number two.

“What do you want to do first?” Peter asked joyously when we got out of the car.

“Oh you know we have to build sandcastles first!” you rushed over to him hugging his side.

Walking down to the beach bantering about how relaxing and fun the day was going to be. You pushed off of Peter once you reached the sand and started running around freely, the biggest smile on your face.

title: True As It Can Be
body:

by ironarm

Steve should have expected it, he really should have.

There were regulations that came with dating Tony Stark. Things that were clear and things that they needed to work through.

Things like how Steve always got strawberry ice cream, while Tony got rocky road. Or when Steve needed to get his homework done before he was down to make out - even though Tony always got his way.

Things like that were clear.

by nonsensicalbelle

Steve bumps into an old high school crush in less than ideal circumstances. His Mother takes a shine to charming James Barnes and the Bucky Steve remembers from high school has only grown more handsome. It’s more of a dare than a good idea, but for better or worse, Steve won’t back down from a fight.
